editorParams.USERINSCRIPT: value.replaceAll(/\@\{\"(user)?id\":\"(.+?)\",\"name\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, user, id, name) => {return controller.getNodeInfo({ id, name })}).replaceAll(/\@\{userid=(.+?),name=(.+?)\}/g,(x, id, name) => {return controller.getNodeInfo({ id, name })})
editorParams.QUOTEINSCRIPT: value.replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\")(,\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\")*\}/g,(x, value, icon) => { const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); if (icon) { icon = icon.slice(8).slice(1, -1); } return controller.getNodeInfo({ icon, ...item })})
editorParams.REPLYSCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\")(,\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\")*\}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); if (icon) { icon = icon.slice(8).slice(1, -1).trim(); } return controller.markerController.parseCommentTag({icon, ...item});})

getPSControls.logicName: 需求实体编辑视图（展示）_工具栏
getPSControls.name: toolbar

getPSControls.logicName: 需求实体编辑视图（展示）_表单

editorParams.TITLE: name
editorParams.PARSESCRIPT: value?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\")(,\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\")*\}/g,(x, value, icon) => { const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); if (icon) { icon = icon.slice(8).slice(1, -1).trim(); } return controller.parseCommentTag({icon, ...item});}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSDEUIActionGroup.name: 附件表格操作列（仅下载）

editorParams.SCRIPTCODE: data.content?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\")(,\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\")*\}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); if (icon) { icon = icon.slice(8).slice(1, -1).trim(); } return controller.parseCommentTag({icon, ...item});}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

editorParams.SCRIPTCODE: data.content?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replaceAll(/\#\{(\".+?\":\".+?\")(,\"icon\":\"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)\")*\}/g, (x, value, icon) => {const item = JSON.parse("{" + value + "}"); if (icon) { icon = icon.slice(8).slice(1, -1).trim(); } return controller.parseCommentTag({icon, ...item});}).replaceAll(/\{\"\emoji\":\"(.+?)\"\}/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji)); return `${tempVal}`})

getPSControlRenders.layoutPanelModel: data.pcontent?.replace(/@{[^,]*,"name":"(.*?)"}/g,"@$1").replace(/@{[^,]*,name=(.*?)}/g,"@$1").replace(/#{"id":"(.+?)","name":"(.+?)","identifier":"(.+?)","icon":"((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)"}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replace(/#{id=(.+?),name=(.+?),identifier=(.+?),icon=((.|[\t\r\f\n\s])+?)}/g, "$4 $3 $2").replaceAll(/(.+?)<\/span>/g,(x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji));return `${tempVal}`;}).replaceAll(/{"emoji":"(.+?)"}/g, (x, emoji) => {const tempVal = decodeURIComponent(atob(emoji));return `${tempVal}`;})
